name: 范政揆
objective:
本課程旨為引導學生建立能夠因應全球化環境所需之能力。透過企業命題之專題導向(PBL)模式，與產業合作共同設計符合國內產業需求之主題，並依主題安排對應領域之教授群及邀請產業代表共同授課，督導學生進行分組進行符合產業趨勢及需求的專題實作。學生在學期末將報告專題實作成果，由企業及授課教授共同評量。此課程也同時邀請來自各國來本校的交換生共同上課，訓練跨文化及語言之溝通力與合作力。
This course is specifically designed for facilitating the students’ global competence building. The curriculum utilizes the needs of domestic industry and arrange the counter-disciplinary faculty members across departments to teach and supervise under the framework of problem-based learning (PBL) model. The course participants include the domestic students and international exchange students across the world, so they can practice how to work together across cultures.
schedule:
第一週   Week 1	介紹本校國際產業跨域3i-PBL計畫發展經歷與本課程目標
Introducing PBL concepts and the aim of the course.
第二週   Week 2	自我介紹:介紹自己的學術背景和經驗(每人3分鐘)
Self-introduction: The participating students will introduce their academic background and experience with industry (3 min per person).
第三週   Week 3	經驗分享:學長姐分享參與過PBL計畫的經驗
Experience sharing: Inviting the students who participated from previous PBL projects to share their results and experiences.
第四週   Week 4	企業代表介紹主題相關之背景資訊與目標
The industry representative will introduce their background and the finalized topics for this course.
第五週   Week 5	基礎理論介紹：製造科技
Introduction of basic theory: Manufacturing technology
基礎理論介紹：設計思考、主題調查及問題分析
Introduction of basic theory: Design Thinking, topic research, Problem analysis
基礎理論介紹：自動化科技
Introduction of basic theory: Automation technology
第六週   Week 6	小組實作及教師回饋
Team work & feedback.
第七週   Week 7	小組實作及教師回饋
Team work & feedback.
第八週   Week 8	小組實作、教師回饋及各組進度報告
Team work, feedbacks, & progress report.
第九週   Week 9	(期中考週)
Midterm Exam
第十週    Week 10	小組實作及教師回饋
Team work & feedback
第十一週   Week 11	小組實作及教師回饋
Team work & feedback
第十二週   Week 12	小組實作、教師回饋及各組進度報告
Team work, feedbacks, & progress report.
第十三週   Week 13	小組實作及教師回饋
Team work & feedback
第十四週   Week 14	小組實作及教師回饋
Team work & feedback
第十五週   Week 15	小組實作、教師回饋及各組進度報告
Team work, feedbacks, & progress report.
第十六週   Week 16	小組實作及教師回饋
Team work & feedback
第十七週   Week 17	小組實作及教師回饋
Team work & feedback
第十八週   Week 18	各組成果報告(期末考週)
Final presentation
Evaluation will be conducted by the industry representative and faculty members
scorePolicy:
Class participation (15%)
Progress report (35%)
Final presentation (50%)
materials: Change by Design: How Design Thinking Transforms Organizations and Inspires Innovation / Tim Brown  | 29. 9. 2009
